headline: Citizens Financial Group Announces Prime Rate Change
summary: PROVIDENCE, R.I., November 07, 2024--Citizens Financial Group, Inc. (NYSE: CFG) announced today that Citizens Bank, N.A. has decreased its prime lending rate to 7.75 percent from 8.00 percent, effective Friday, November 8, 2024.
